        public boolean hasEmptySlot(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the player has at least 1 empty slot in his inventory.

        player - the player to check
        Returns:
        true if the player inventory has empty slots

      • isPack

        public boolean isPack(int amount)
        Check if the amount isn't lower than 0 and greater than 64.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount.
        Returns:
        true if it fits between 0 and 64

      • slotIndex

        public int slotIndex(int column,
                     int row)
        Convert any coordinate to minecraft chest slot value.
        Parameters:
        column - the column
        row - the row.
        Returns:
        the slot value based on the column and row
